publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7885 Richard Lochhead: The Marine (Scotland) Act 2010 (Transitional and Consequential Provisions) Order 2011—That the Parliament recommends that the Marine (Scotland) Act 2010 (Transitional and Consequential Provisions) Order 2011 be approved. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham*

S3M-7885 Richard Lochhead: The Marine (Scotland) Act 2010 (Transitional and Consequential Provisions) Order 2011—That the Parliament recommends that the Marine (Scotland) Act 2010 (Transitional and Consequential Provisions) Order 2011 be approved. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham
